chapters.title: Chapter 49:  Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Ronam, p. 731—Clan chief of the Taardad Aiel during Aviendha's sixth step through the columns of Rhuidean the second time through. He is Rhuarc's son. He is an excellent chief, as his father was: wise, but willing to do battle when it was necessary. Rhuarc once told him that he considered the previous Empress to be an honorable woman, but her daughter is not. He is ten years older than Padra, and handsome. He met Rand when he first came to Cold Rocks Hold. See also Rhuarc.
